convertationToPDFAborted: Unable to convert file to PDF. Save this file in PDF format manually and try to attach again.
numberMustBeDivisibleBy100: The value must be a divisible by 100
invalidJson: Value shall be a valid JSON
monkeyRequestsDetected: Your request has been processed, but we found that it is repeated several times. Maybe you key fuse?

ubm_desktop-uiSettings.previewIsNotAvailable: Preview is not available. Page should be reloaded after save this setting to see effect
ubm_desktop-uiSettings.HTMLPageTitle: Title of HTML page (text on the browser tab)
ubm_desktop-uiSettings.applicationNameDescription: Name of application for show on the login form. In case explicitly defined as empty string - not shown in login form. In simple case - string, for example My App, for localization can be specified as object with keys=locale: {"en": "My App", "uk": "Мій додаток"}
ubm_desktop-uiSettings.supportEMailAddressDescription: This field activate button on error message what allows to send an error text to specified address. The value must comply with the rules for generating an html-link with
ubm_desktop-uiSettings.configurationChanged: Configuration is changed. Reload page to see new settings in action. Some settings can be cached by browser, so better to use "Empty cache and hard reload" browser action to see it immediately
ubm_desktop-uiSettings.sidebarLogoExpandedData: SVG or image (max 210x40 px, size 5 MB), visible in the top-left corner of the screen when sidebar is expanded
ubm_desktop-uiSettings.sidebarLogoCollapsedData: SVG or image (max 42x40 px, size 5 MB), visible in the top-left corner of the screen when sidebar is collapsed
